name: Create Data Compliance Record
description: Create a data compliance record and link it with a corresponding task and to the parent incident.

steps.name: Add Comment and Update GDPR SLA

message.content:
Thanks for your input.
 
 GDPR Compliance Record #{{vars.steps.Create_GDPR_Data_Compliance_Record.id}} and corresponding Task #{{vars.steps.Create_Task_GDPR_Assessment.id}} has been created.

steps.name: Add Comment and Update HIPAA SLA

message.content:
Thanks for your input.
 
 GDPR Compliance Record #{{vars.steps.Create_GDPR_Data_Compliance_Record.id}} and corresponding Task #{{vars.steps.Create_Task_GDPR_Assessment.id}} has been created.

steps.name: Add Comment to Incident
steps.description: Add a comment stating that the Data Compliance Record is already created for the Incident.

resource.content:
Thanks for your input.
 
 GDPR Compliance Record #{{vars.steps.Find_Correlated_Compliance_Record[0].dataCompliances[0].id}} and corresponding Task #{{vars.steps.Find_Correlated_Compliance_Record[0].tasks[0].id}} has already been created.

message.content: Initiating PHI(Protected Health Information) Breach Risk Assessment.

resource.name: Perform GDPR Assessment
resource.description: {% if vars.testModeStatus %}Test Mode ON{% endif %} As per GDPR guidelines provided in [*Article - 33*](https://gdpr-info.eu/art-33-gdpr/), in the event of a personal data breach, it is mandatory to notify Data Protection Authority within 72 hours of the breach happening. Based on your information, the following GDPR Data Compliance record has been created. [GDPR Assessment Record #{{vars.steps.Create_GDPR_Data_Compliance_Record.id}}](/modules/incidents/{{vars.steps.Create_GDPR_Data_Compliance_Record.uuid}}) Perform the tasks provided in the record and complete the GDPR Assessment

resource.name: Perform GDPR Assessment
resource.description: {% if vars.testModeStatus %}Test Mode ON{% endif %} As per HIPPA guidelines provided in [*Article - 33*](https://gdpr-info.eu/art-33-gdpr/), in the event of a PHI/ePHI breach, it is mandatory to notify Data Protection Authority within 72 hours of the breach happening. Based on your information, the following GDPR Data Compliance record has been created. [GDPR Assessment Record #{{vars.steps.Create_GDPR_Data_Compliance_Record.id}}](https://{{globalVars.Server_fqhn}}/modules/incidents/{{vars.steps.Create_GDPR_Data_Compliance_Record.uuid}}) Perform the tasks provided in the record and complete the GDPR Assessment

step_variables.testModeStatus: {% if vars.testMode %}true{% elif (not vars.testMode) and (vars.testEmail | length > 0 and vars.testEmail != 'NA') %}true{% elif (not vars.testMode) and (vars.testEmail | length == 0 or vars.testEmail == 'NA') %}false{% endif %}

schema.title: Submit Personal Data Breach Information

inputVariables.name: breachOccurrenceDate
inputVariables.label: Breach Occurrence Date
inputVariables.title: Date/Time Field
inputVariables.tooltip: Date and time when the data breach incident took place

inputVariables.name: breachDetectionDate
inputVariables.label: Breach Detection Date
inputVariables.title: Date/Time Field
inputVariables.tooltip: Date and time when the personal data breach incident detected

inputVariables.name: wasTheDataEncrypted
inputVariables.label: Was the data encrypted?
inputVariables.title: Picklist
inputVariables.tooltip: Choose Yes - If breached data was encrypted

inputVariables.name: wasTheExposureResolved
inputVariables.label: Was the exposure resolved?
inputVariables.title: Picklist
inputVariables.tooltip: Choose Yes - If the data breach exposure is not yet resolved

inputVariables.name: isHarmRiskOrMisuseForeseeable
inputVariables.label: Is data misuse foreseeable?
inputVariables.title: Picklist
inputVariables.tooltip: Choose Yes - If the data breach risks to the rights and freedoms of data subjects

inputVariables.name: whatWasTheDataFormat
inputVariables.label: What was the data format?
inputVariables.tooltip: Such as Physical or Digital Documents, Multimedia, Spreadsheets etc

inputVariables.name: whatWasTheDataSource
inputVariables.label: What was the data source?
inputVariables.tooltip: Such as Databases, Cloud, Third-party Site etc.

inputVariables.name: whoAccessedPHIEPHIWithoutPermission
inputVariables.label: Who accessed PHI/ePHI without permission? (If known)

inputVariables.name: measuresInPlaceToMitigateTheRisk
inputVariables.label: Measures in place to mitigate the risk
inputVariables.title: Text Area

response_mapping.customSuccessMessage: Data breach details have been collected successfully.

routes.name: Compliance Law -> Create Data Compliance Record
routes.label: GDPR

routes.name: Create Data Compliance Record -> Create Task GDPR Assessment
Create HIPAA Data Compliance Record -> Create Task HIPAA Assessment
Create Task GDPR Assessment -> Add Comment and Update GDPR SLA
Create Task HIPAA Assessment -> Add Comment and Update HIPAA SLA
Find Correlated Compliance Record -> Is Correlated Complaiance Record Found
Get Data Breach Details -> Regulatory Body
routes.label: Submit

routes.name: Is Corelated Complaiance Record Found -> Add Comment to Incident
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Is Corelated Complaiance Record Found -> Get Data Breach Details
routes.label: No

routes.label: HIPAA
